text: Va [musrikon] ʙo saxttarin savgandhojason ʙa Alloh taolo savgand xurdand, ki agar mu'cizae [ki xostaand] ʙar eson ʙiojad, hatman, imon meovarand. [Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Mu'cizot faqat dar ixtijori Alloh taolo ast»va sumo [ej mu'minon] ci medoned, ki agar [mu'cizae ham] ʙijojad, imon nameovarand
